about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a backend developer passionate about creating robust and scalable systems. I have extensive experience in developing distributed systems and microservices. I also have solid experience designing and implementing relational and non-relational databases.

experiences.desc: Development of a comprehensive professional vehicle fleet management application, integrating automated ticket management. Worked using Clean Architecture, Test-Driven Development (TDD), and best DevOps practices.
experiences.tech: Symfony, API Platform, Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD

experiences.desc: Developed a B2B interface coupled with mobile apps for taxi management. Implemented a mock of the Stripe payment system, reducing test processing time by 40% in CI. Applied Test-First methodology supervised by a software architect following DDD principles, Hexagonal Architecture, and CQRS.
experiences.tech: Symfony 6.4, API Platform 3, Docker, PHPUnit, PostgreSQL, Agile

experiences.desc: Redesign of a partner extranet for IT backup service management. Developed two distinct APIs: one for user management and another for product integration with external Java services. Worked in an ISO 27001 certified environment for data security.
experiences.tech: Symfony 6.2, API Platform 3, Docker, PHPUnit, MariaDB, Agile

experiences.desc: Managed a Discord community providing developer support and networking. Organized and facilitated Nuxt Paris Meetup, including a presentation on new features of Nuxt 3.
Tested websites, fixed bugs, and validated pre-production. Gained experience with WordPress and SPIP CMS.
